title: Welcome to KTER
author: Jo Thompson
text:
## Hello

Wishing you a very good time of day, whatever that may be, where you are right now. Welcome to this area of cyberspace. This is devoted to things that I have found either interesting, annoying or at least in some form noteworthy. There is no real purpose or expectations and certainly no intention of this ever becoming interesting enough to get usbscribers. It is simply a way of my testing and developed skills I may find useful elsewhere. 
 Thank you for finding me and bothering to read
*KTER*
